name: Obelisk (Tom Quinn)
description:
WASD or arrows to move, move into enemies to attack, click skills or hit their hotkeys to activate them, and hover your cursor over anything to find out about it. How low can you go?

Find more info at the game's Ludum Dare page.

Find the latest downloadable versions for PC, Mac, and Linux at the Github releases page. If you're having aspect ratio, mouse, or sound issues, try those out.

And find the source code on Github.

Check out my portfolio for more fun stuff!
